quotes.quote: Money may not buy happiness, but I'd rather cry in a Jaguar than on a bus.
When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
Relationships, like cars, should undergo regular services to make sure they are still roadworthy.
To attract men, I wear a perfume called 'New Car Interior.'
Always focus on the front windshield and not the review mirror.
The car has become an article of dress without which we feel uncertain, unclad, and incomplete in the urban compound.
Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves.
If all the cars in the United States were placed end to end, it would probably be Labor Day Weekend.
It is amazing how may drivers, even at the Formula One Level, think that the brakes are for slowing the car down.
The car has become the carapace, the protective and aggressive shell, of urban and suburban man.
More books, more racing and more foolishness with cars and motorcycles are in the works.
Never have more children than you have car windows.
If you own a home with wheels on it and several cars without, you just might be a redneck.
We all know that small cars are good for us. But so is cod liver oil. And jogging.
A guy knows he's in love when he loses interest in his car for a couple of days.
We're in a giant car heading towards a brick wall and everyone's arguing over where they're going to sit.
If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
A car can massage organs which no masseur can reach. It is the one remedy for the disorders of the great sympathetic nervous system.
The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
Straight roads are for fast cars, turns are for fast drivers.
In the old days drivers were fat and tires were skinny.
Women are like cars: we all want a Ferrari, sometimes want a pickup truck, and end up with a station wagon.
If your car could travel at the speed of light, would your headlights work?
It is amazing how quickly the kids learn to drive a car, yet are unable to understand the lawn mower, snowblower and vacuum cleaner.
Bicycling is a big part of the future. It has to be. There's something wrong with a society that drives a car to work out in a gym.
Cars and bumper cars are two very different things. NEVER sleep in a bumper car.
Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car.
With each replacement of parts, a car slowly becomes Chinese.
Take care of your car in the garage, and the car will take care of you on the road.
Environmentalists have a very conflicted relationship with their cars.
To get to know a country, you must have direct contact with the earth. It's futile to gaze at the world through a car window.
A car for every purse and purpose.
Not having to own a car has made me realize what a waste of time the automobile is.
Someday we'll look back on this moment and plow into a parked car.
Don't get your fuel from the same place your car does
It is amazing how may drivers, even at the Formula One Level, think that the brakes are for slowing the car down.
The cars we drive say a lot about us.
When you are fitted in a racing car and you race to win, second or third place is not enough.
It's a waste of energy to be angry with a man who behaves badly, just as it is to be angry with a car that won't go.
Flying cars are not a very efficient way to move things from one point to another.
A real patriot is the fellow who gets a parking ticket and rejoices that the system works.
Shutting off the thought process is not rejuvenating; the mind is like a car battery - it recharges by running.
Living with a conscience is like driving a car with the brakes on.
The racing driver needs to be fed a diet of other racing drivers.
The winner ain't the one with the fastest car; it's the one who refuses to lose.
There’s a lot of stress, but once you get in the car, all that goes out the window.
The longest journey begins with a single step, not with a turn of the ignition key.
What’s behind you doesn’t matter.
Never lend your car to anyone to whom you have given birth.
Marriage has no guarantees. If that’s what you’re looking for, go live with a car battery.
A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race.
You can have any color you like as long as it's black.
Faster, Faster, until the thrill of speed overcomes the fear of death.
Take it easy driving, the life you save may be mine.
Stealing a man's wife, that's nothing, but stealing his car, that's larceny.
We aren’t addicted to oil, but our cars are.
Why worry about death, it’ll come sooner or later.
People don’t take trips…Trips take people.
he way I drive, the way I handle a car, is an expression of my inner feelings.
I know a lot about cars, man. I can look at any car's headlights and tell you exactly which way it's coming.
The lead car is absolutely unique, except for the one behind it which is identical.
If you’re in control, you’re not going fast enough.
If one day the speed kills me. Do not cry, because I was smiling.
Every parent knows that for a kid, the car is chloroform.
My wife wants sex in the back of the car, and she wants me to drive.
If the car feels like it is on rails, you are probably driving too slow.
When it comes to cars, only two varieties of people are possible - cowards and fools.
A dream without ambition is like a car without gas—you're not going anywhere.
I couldn’t repair your brakes, so I made your horn louder.
When everything is coming your way, you’re in the wrong lane.
I replaced the headlights in my car with strobe lights, so it looks like I'm the only one moving.
If you don't look back at your car after you park it, you own the wrong car.
Hug your kids at home, but belt them in the car.
Leave sooner, drive slower, live longer.
